name: Guitar Pro 3 Tablature
summary: Learn about .GP3 files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: Arobas Music Guitar Pro is a multitrack guitar composition tool. Guitar Pro was initially designed only for Windows but expanded to Mac OS X in July 2006 with version 5 of the software.

Whit each new version of Guitar Pro, the software saves tabs with an extension that corresponds with the software version. For example, Guitar Pro 5 saves tabs as .GP5 files, Guitar Pro 4 saves tabs as .GP4 files, and so on. However, each new version of Guitar Pro still supports previous Guitar Pro file types.

description: A GP3 file contains tablature data composed by Guitar Pro 3 or Guitar Pro 4. It stores musical notation for one or more plucked string instruments, including guitar, bass, or banjo. GP3 files do not store audio data; they contain MIDI data that can be played back or exported as a document.

instructions: You can open a GP3 file with Arobas Music Guitar Pro in Windows and macOS. You can also open a GP3 file with the open-source Tuxguitar (multiplatform) and DGuitar (multiplatform) guitar notation programs.

images.alt: Screenshot of a .gp3 file in Arobas Music Guitar Pro 7.6
